title: Indeed A Good Anime
review: The story is interesting, the character development is done right and it is exotic and so beautifully drawn.Everyone is praising the legs of the main character but they forget that she is shorthaired like a boy. So it is not a straight 10/10.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Masculine Mary Sue
review: Hello all,Do you love Mary Sues especially ones with masculine short hair?Do you love casting couch (come on, you know it's good and you want some!)?Do you love royal;ties, mechanical royalties, merchandising takes, legal obligations, outsourced 3PL and of course theme park takes and projections?Then you will love this sequel.The above is what this whole ironically titled franchise is about.
